## ShaderFramework.getCameraClipPlane() method

Gets the clip plane

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getCameraClipPlane(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope): any;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  scope | [PBInsideFunctionScope](doc/markdown/./device.pbinsidefunctionscope.md) | Current shader scope |

**Returns:**

any
